tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:patient complains of Kidney x 6 weeks. NKDA. pt is a male engraver aged 56 yrs. o:Height 64 in, Weight 227 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

s:M aged 56 Ys complained of Kidney. patient denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. denies any smoking Alcohol 1-4 beers/month o:Height 64 in, Weight 228 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Renal Scintigram.

tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:a white M engraver aged 56 Ys describes Kidney. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month he denies smoking o:Height 64 in, Weight 229 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

s:pt presents with 15 months history of Kidney. he is a male engraver aged 56 years. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life he drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 64 in, Weight 232 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 150 cc/hr bolus.
